name: Forest Bandits
description:
Forest Bandits
Is a game where you play as forest bandits and rob people on the highway.
To recruit more bandits and upgrade your camp.

This project is abandoned as the scope for the game was way too high for a sole developer.

How to play?
Camp: click on the buildings to recruit more Bandit upgrades and into the world map.
World: Click on roads or camp.
Road/Gameplay: WASD to move, hold rigth move to rotate camera, click the bandits icon to place your bandits and click start ambush when you ready.

Bug's
The hide mechanic for the Bandits don't work so they can hide anywhere.
